markers.name: Squad Spawn #1
markers.description: Heading towards the Armory Outpost tunnel puts you in the middle of an intense crossfire, as two rival squads are already battling for control.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #2
markers.description: You can head to the Hydra Station for a Server Decryption missionâ€”just stay alert, as other squads are likely to intercept. Alternatively, push toward the tunnel near the radiation zone for guaranteed close-quarters combat against at least two enemy squads.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #3
markers.description: Advancing toward the tunnel near the Support Center will put you up against a hostile squad already attempting to secure the tunnel entrance.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #4
markers.description: Positioned near the Support Center tunnel, this route takes you straight into a high-intensity clash, where at least two squads are already battling for control inside..

markers.name: Squad Spawn #5
markers.description: A relatively safe spawn point with minimal early encounters. If the area remains quiet, push toward the radiation zone to find action and higher-tier loot opportunities.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #6
markers.description: Expect possible contact with an enemy squad early on, or head straight to the tunnel area for intense engagements where two rival squads are already clashing.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #7
markers.description: A relatively safe spawn for those looking to avoid early combat. From here, you can move toward the radiation zone through the nearest tunnel for potential mid-game encounters.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #8
markers.description: You might face an enemy squad right after deployment, but you can also move quickly toward the nearest tunnel to access the radiation zone. Alternatively, enter the zone through the main gateâ€”expect a bit resistance there.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #9
markers.description: Expect an early clash with Squad 8 shortly after deployment. If you manage to avoid the fight, youâ€™ll have one of the quickest routes to the radiation zone.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #10
markers.description: Rare Spawn Location - This spawn point is infrequently used, making it a hidden gem for squads seeking a quieter start. From here, you can plan your route to avoid early confrontations and focus on looting and strategic positioning.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #11
markers.description: Positioned right on the edge of the radiation zone. If you manage to avoid early fights, you can safely loot half the zone and return loaded with high-value gear.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #12
markers.description: Located near the Armory Outpost tunnel, this spawn point often turns into a hotspot with intense battles against two to three enemy squads.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #13
markers.description: Located near the Armory Outpost tunnel, this spawn point often turns into a hotspot with intense battles against two to three enemy squads.

markers.name: Squad Spawn #14
markers.description: Located near the Armory Outpost tunnel, this spawn point often turns into a hotspot with intense battles against two to three enemy squads.

markers.description: Rare Spawn Location - This spawn point is infrequently used, making it a hidden gem for squads seeking a quieter start. From here, you can plan your route to avoid early confrontations and focus on looting and strategic positioning.

markers.name: Yellow Password Door
markers.description: Located at the Armory Outpost, this locked room requires a Yellow Password Letter to enter. Once inside, you can expect moderate-tier loot.

markers.name: Red Password Door
markers.description: Located at the Support Center, this locked room requires a Red Password Letter to enter. Be prepared to face the Steel Front Boss guarding the entrance. Once inside, you can expect moderate-tier loot.

markers.name: Boss #1
markers.description: Infected boss with pistol - Located at the Armory Outpost, in a downside building

markers.name: Boss #2
markers.description: Steel front boss with m249 - Located at the Support Center, on the first floor.

markers.name: Boss #3
markers.description: Shotgun boss with S12k - Located at the Special Barracks, on the first floor
